thread.section_title: Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good hotel by the airport
thread.title_full: Good hotel by the airport - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: Lillian W
title: Good hotel by the airport
text: I stayed here 1 night for a layover in SFO. Great staff, very clean rooms. Rooms looked recently remodeled/updated. Overall I was very satisfied with the room quality. Hotel gym had good equipment as well, good mix of cardio, weights, etc. The only complaint I have is with the bar/restaurant downstairs. I had a meal at the bar that night. The wines were good -- good selection, though a bit on the pricey side. The food was sub-par. I ordered a soup which tasted like clam chowder from a can with some garnish on top. I would come here again if they improved the food at the restaurant.
